description: Multiple unauthenticated Denial-of-Service (DoS) vulnerabilities exists in the Soft AP daemon accessed via the PAPI protocol. Successful exploitation of these vulnerabilites result in the ability to interrupt the normal operation of the affected Access Point.

product.name: Aruba InstantOS and Aruba Access Points running ArubaOS 10

enisaIdProduct.product_version: InstantOS or ArubaOS (access points) 8.11.x.x: 8.11.2.1 and below.
